question: Where is the Trakai city located in Lithuania?
true_answer: Trakai is located 30 km west of the center of Vilnius, in Vilnius County.
asked_question_translated: Kje se nahaja mesto Trakai v Litvi?
answer: Mesto Trakai se nahaja v jugovzhodnem delu Litve, pribli≈æno 28 kilometrov zahodno od glavnega mesta Vilna.
answer_translated_eng: Trakai is located in the south-eastern part of Lithuania, about 28 kilometres west of the capital Vilnius.
